00100 Sprites = [
00101     {
00102         'id': 1,
00103         'name': 'train',
00104         'frames': 5,
00105     },
00106     {
00107         'id': 2,
00108         'name': 'helicopter',
00109         'frames': 8,
00110     },
00111     {
00112         'id': 3,
00113         'name': 'airplane',
00114         'frames': 11,
00115     },
00116     {
00117         'id': 4,
00118         'name': 'boat',
00119         'frames': 8,
00120     },
00121     {
00122         'id': 5,
00123         'name': 'monster',
00124         'frames': 16,
00125     },
00126     {
00127         'id': 6,
00128         'name': 'tornado',
00129         'frames': 3,
00130     },
00131     {
00132         'id': 7,
00133         'name': 'explosion',
00134         'frames': 6,
00135     },
00136     {
00137         'id': 8,
00138         'name': 'bus',
00139         'frames': 4,
00140     },
00141 ]
00142 for spriteData in Sprites:
00143     images = []
00144     spriteData['images'] = images
00145     for i in range(0, spriteData['frames']):
00146         fileName = 'images/micropolisEngine/obj%d-%d.png' % (
00147             spriteData['id'],
00148             i,
00149         )
00150         fileName = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "../.." , fileName)
00151         fileName = os.path.abspath(fileName)
00152         image = cairo.ImageSurface.create_from_png(fileName)
00153         images.append(image)

00167 class MicropolisDrawingArea(tiledrawingarea.TileDrawingArea):
00168 
00169 
00170     def __init__(
00171         self,
00172         engine=None,
00173         interests=('city', 'tick'),
00174         sprite=micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED,
00175         showData=True,
00176         showRobots=True,
00177         showSprites=True,
00178         showChalk=True,
00179         mapStyle='all',
00180         overlayAlpha=0.5,
00181         engaged=True,
00182         **args):
00183 
00184         args['tileCount'] = micropolisengine.TILE_COUNT
00185         args['sourceTileSize'] = micropolisengine.BITS_PER_TILE
00186         args['worldCols'] = micropolisengine.WORLD_W
00187         args['worldRows'] = micropolisengine.WORLD_H
00188 
00189         self.engine = engine
00190         self.showData = showData
00191         self.showRobots = showRobots
00192         self.showSprites = showSprites
00193         self.showChalk = showChalk
00194         self.mapStyle = mapStyle
00195         self.overlayAlpha = overlayAlpha
00196         self.engaged = engaged
00197 
00198         tiledrawingarea.TileDrawingArea.__init__(self, **args)
00199 
00200         self.sprite = sprite
00201 
00202         engine.expressInterest(
00203             self,
00204             interests)
00205         engine.addView(self)
00206 
00207         self.blinkFlag = True
00208 
00209         self.reset()
00210 
00211 
00212     def update(self, name, *args):
00213 
00214         #print "MicropolisDrawingArea update", self, name, args
00215 
00216         self.queue_draw()
00217 
00218 
00219     def makeTileMap(self):
00220         tiledrawingarea.TileDrawingArea.makeTileMap(self)
00221 
00222         if False:
00223             # Remap some of the tiles so we can see them for debugging.
00224             self.tileMap[micropolisengine.REDGE] = micropolisengine.FIRE
00225             self.tileMap[micropolisengine.CHANNEL] = micropolisengine.RADTILE
00226 
00227 
00228     def reset(self):
00229         self.selectToolByName('Bulldozer')
00230 
00231 
00232     def configTileEngine(self, tengine):
00233 
00234         engine = self.engine
00235         buffer = engine.getMapBuffer()
00236         #print "Map buffer", buffer
00237         tengine.setBuffer(buffer)
00238         tengine.width = micropolisengine.WORLD_W
00239         tengine.height = micropolisengine.WORLD_H
00240 
00241         from micropolisengine import ZONEBIT, PWRBIT, ALLBITS, LIGHTNINGBOLT
00242 
00243         def tileFunction(col, row, tile):
00244             if (tile & ZONEBIT) and not (tile & PWRBIT) and random.random() < 0.5:
00245                 tile = LIGHTNINGBOLT | (tile & ALLBITS)
00246             return tile
00247 
00248         self.tileFunction = tileFunction
00249 
00250         # Unsigned short tile values, in column major order.
00251         tengine.tileFormat = tileengine.TILE_FORMAT_SHORT_UNSIGNED
00252         tengine.colBytes = micropolisengine.BYTES_PER_TILE * micropolisengine.WORLD_H
00253         tengine.rowBytes = micropolisengine.BYTES_PER_TILE
00254         tengine.tileMask = micropolisengine.LOMASK
00255 
00256 
00257     def getCell(self, col, row):
00258 
00259         return self.engine.getTile(col, row)
00260 
00261 
00262     def beforeDraw(
00263         self):
00264 
00265         engine = self.engine
00266         self.blinkFlag = (engine.tickCount() % 60) < 30
00267 
00268 
00269     def drawOverlays(
00270         self,
00271         ctx):
00272 
00273         if self.showData:
00274             self.drawData(ctx)
00275 
00276         if self.showRobots:
00277             self.drawRobots(ctx)
00278 
00279         if self.showSprites:
00280             self.drawSprites(ctx)
00281 
00282         if self.showChalk:
00283             self.drawChalk(ctx)
00284 
00285         if self.showCursor:
00286             tool = self.getActiveTool()
00287             if tool:
00288                 tool.drawCursor(self, ctx)
00289 
00290 
00291     def setMapStyle(self, mapStyle):
00292         self.mapStyle = mapStyle
00293 
00294 
00295     def drawData(self, ctx):
00296         mapStyle = self.mapStyle
00297         engine = self.engine
00298         dataImage, dataAlpha, width, height = \
00299             engine.getDataImageAlphaSize(mapStyle)
00300         if not dataImage:
00301             return
00302 
00303         width = 1.0 / width
00304         height = 1.0 / height
00305 
00306         ctx.save()
00307 
00308         tileSize = self.tileSize
00309 
00310         ctx.translate(self.panX, self.panY)
00311 
00312         ctx.scale(
00313             self.worldCols * tileSize,
00314             self.worldRows * tileSize)
00315 
00316         ctx.rectangle(0, 0, 1, 1)
00317         ctx.clip()
00318 
00319         imageWidth = dataImage.get_width()
00320         imageHeight = dataImage.get_height()
00321 
00322         ctx.scale(
00323             width / imageWidth,
00324             height / imageHeight)
00325 
00326         ctx.set_source_surface(
00327             dataImage,
00328             0,
00329             0)
00330         ctx.paint_with_alpha(dataAlpha)
00331 
00332         ctx.restore()
00333 
00334 
00335     def drawSprites(self, ctx):
00336         engine = self.engine
00337         sprite = engine.spriteList
00338         while True:
00339             if not sprite:
00340                 break
00341             self.drawSprite(ctx, sprite)
00342             sprite = sprite.next
00343 
00344 
00345     def drawSprite(self, ctx, sprite):
00346 
00347         spriteType = sprite.type
00348         spriteFrame = sprite.frame
00349 
00350         if (spriteFrame == 0 or
00351             spriteType == micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED or
00352             spriteType >= micropolisengine.SPRITE_COUNT):
00353             return
00354 
00355         ctx.save()
00356 
00357         x = sprite.x
00358         y = sprite.y
00359         width = sprite.width
00360         height = sprite.height
00361         tileSize = self.tileSize
00362 
00363         ctx.translate(self.panX, self.panY)
00364         ctx.scale(tileSize / 16.0, tileSize / 16.0)
00365 
00366         ctx.translate(x + sprite.xOffset, y + sprite.yOffset)
00367 
00368         image = Sprites[spriteType - 1]['images'][spriteFrame - 1]
00369 
00370         ctx.set_source_surface(
00371             image,
00372             0,
00373             0)
00374         #ctx.rectangle(0, 0, 1, 1)
00375         ctx.paint()
00376 
00377         ctx.restore()
00378 
00379 
00380     def drawRobots(self, ctx):
00381         engine = self.engine
00382         robots = engine.robots
00383 
00384         if not robots:
00385             return
00386 
00387         ctx.save()
00388 
00389         tileSize = self.tileSize
00390 
00391         ctx.translate(self.panX, self.panY)
00392         ctx.scale(tileSize / 16.0, tileSize / 16.0)
00393 
00394         for robot in robots:
00395             robot.draw(ctx)
00396 
00397         ctx.restore()
00398 
00399 
00400     def drawChalk(self, ctx):
00401         pass # TODO: drawChalk
00402 
00403 
00404     def tickEngine(self):
00405 
00406         # Don't do anything! The engine ticks itself.
00407         return
00408 
00409 
00410     def makePie(self):
00411 
00412         pie = micropolispiemenus.MakePie(lambda toolName: self.selectToolByName(toolName))
00413         self.pie = pie
00414 
00415 
00416     def handleButtonPress(
00417         self,
00418         widget,
00419         event):
00420 
00421         self.handlePieButtonPress(
00422             widget,
00423             event)
00424 
00425 
00426     def handleKey(
00427         self,
00428         key):
00429 
00430         if key == 'm':
00431             self.engine.heatSteps = 1
00432             self.engine.heatRule = 0
00433             return True
00434         elif key == 'n':
00435             self.engine.heatSteps = 1
00436             self.engine.heatRule = 1
00437             return True
00438         elif key == 'o':
00439             self.engine.heatSteps = 0
00440             return True
00441 
00442         return False
00443 
00444 
00445     def engage(self):
00446         self.engaged = True
00447 
00448 
00449     def disengage(self):
00450         self.engaged = False
00451

00465 class NoticeMicropolisDrawingArea(MicropolisDrawingArea):
00466 
00467 
00468     def __init__(
00469         self,
00470         follow=None,
00471         centerOnTileHandler=None,
00472         **args):
00473 
00474         args['keyable'] = False
00475         args['clickable'] = False
00476         args['zoomable'] = False
00477         args['pannable'] = False
00478         args['menuable'] = False
00479         args['showCursor'] = False
00480         args['scale'] = 2
00481 
00482         MicropolisDrawingArea.__init__(self, **args)
00483 
00484         self.follow = follow
00485         self.centerOnTileHandler = centerOnTileHandler
00486 
00487 
00488     def handleMouseHover(
00489         self,
00490         event):
00491 
00492         pass
00493 
00494 
00495     def handleButtonPress(
00496         self,
00497         widget,
00498         event):
00499 
00500         centerOnTileHandler = self.centerOnTileHandler
00501         if centerOnTileHandler:
00502             centerX, centerY = self.getCenterTile()
00503             centerOnTileHandler(centerX, centerY)
00504 
00505 
00506     def handleMouseDrag(
00507         self,
00508         event):
00509 
00510         pass
00511 
00512 
00513     def handleButtonRelease(
00514         self,
00515         widget,
00516         event):
00517 
00518         pass
00519 
00520 
00521     def handleMouseScroll(
00522         self,
00523         widget,
00524         event):
00525 
00526         pass
00527 
00528 
00529     def beforeDraw(
00530         self):
00531 
00532         MicropolisDrawingArea.beforeDraw(self)
00533 
00534         engine = self.engine
00535         self.blinkFlag = (engine.tickCount() % 30) < 15
00536 
00537         sprite = self.sprite
00538         if sprite != micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED:
00539             s = engine.getSprite(sprite)
00540             if s:
00541                 fudge = 8
00542                 x = ((s.x + s.xHot + fudge) / 16.0)
00543                 y = ((s.y + s.yHot + fudge) / 16.0)
00544                 self.centerOnTile(x, y)
00545

00549 
00550 class NavigationMicropolisDrawingArea(MicropolisDrawingArea):
00551 
00552 
00553     def __init__(
00554         self,
00555         **args):
00556 
00557         args['keyable'] = False
00558         args['clickable'] = False
00559         args['zoomable'] = False
00560         args['pannable'] = False
00561         args['menuable'] = False
00562         args['showCursor'] = False
00563         args['showRobots'] = False
00564         args['showSprites'] = False
00565         args['scale'] = 1.0 / micropolisengine.EDITOR_TILE_SIZE
00566         args['overlayAlpha'] = 0.8
00567 
00568         MicropolisDrawingArea.__init__(self, **args)
00569 
00570         self.currentView = None
00571         self.panning = False
00572         self.panningView = None
00573         self.panningStartCursorX = 0
00574         self.panningStartCursorY = 0
00575         self.panningStartPanX = 0
00576         self.panningStartPanY = 0
00577 
00578 
00579     def drawOverlays(self, ctx):
00580 
00581         MicropolisDrawingArea.drawOverlays(self, ctx)
00582 
00583         self.drawOtherViews(ctx)
00584 
00585 
00586     def getViewBox(self, view):
00587 
00588         viewRect = view.get_allocation()
00589         viewWidth = viewRect.width
00590         viewHeight = viewRect.height
00591 
00592         tileSize = self.tileSize
00593         # @todo Validate the view.tileSize before using it. View might not be drawn yet, and we get the wrong size.
00594         viewTileSize = view.tileSize
00595         viewScale = float(tileSize) / float(viewTileSize)
00596 
00597         x = self.panX - (view.panX * viewScale)
00598         y = self.panY - (view.panY * viewScale)
00599         width = viewWidth * viewScale
00600         height = viewHeight * viewScale
00601 
00602         #print "GETVIEWBOX", "view", view, "pan", view.panX, view.panY, "tileSize", view.tileSize, "pos", x, y, "size", width, height
00603 
00604         return x, y, width, height
00605 
00606 
00607     def drawOtherViews(self, ctx):
00608 
00609         if self.panning:
00610             currentView = self.panningView
00611         else:
00612             currentView = self.currentView
00613 
00614         views = self.engine.views
00615         #print "drawOtherViews", views
00616 
00617         for view in views:
00618 
00619             if not view.pannable:
00620                 continue
00621 
00622             x, y, width, height = self.getViewBox(view)
00623 
00624             if view == currentView:
00625 
00626                 pad = 4
00627 
00628                 ctx.rectangle(
00629                     x - pad,
00630                     y - pad,
00631                     width + (pad * 2),
00632                     height + (pad * 2))
00633 
00634 
00635                 ctx.set_line_width(
00636                     pad * 2)
00637 
00638                 ctx.set_source_rgb(
00639                     0.0,
00640                     0.0,
00641                     1.0)
00642 
00643                 ctx.stroke_preserve()
00644 
00645                 ctx.set_line_width(
00646                     pad)
00647 
00648                 ctx.set_source_rgb(
00649                     1.0,
00650                     1.0,
00651                     0.0)
00652 
00653                 ctx.stroke()
00654 
00655             else:
00656 
00657                 pad = 2
00658 
00659                 ctx.rectangle(
00660                     x - pad,
00661                     y - pad,
00662                     width + (pad * 2),
00663                     height + (pad * 2))
00664 
00665                 ctx.set_line_width(
00666                     pad * 2)
00667 
00668                 ctx.set_source_rgb(
00669                     1.0,
00670                     1.0,
00671                     1.0)
00672 
00673                 ctx.stroke_preserve()
00674 
00675                 ctx.set_line_width(
00676                     pad)
00677 
00678                 ctx.set_source_rgb(
00679                     0.0,
00680                     0.0,
00681                     0.0)
00682 
00683                 ctx.stroke()
00684 
00685 
00686     def getCursorPosition(
00687         self,
00688         event):
00689 
00690         if not event:
00691             x, y, state = self.window.get_pointer()
00692         elif (hasattr(event, 'is_hint') and
00693               event.is_hint):
00694             x, y, state = event.window.get_pointer()
00695         else:
00696             x = event.x
00697             y = event.y
00698             state = event.state
00699 
00700         return x, y
00701 
00702 
00703     def handleMouseHover(
00704         self,
00705         event):
00706 
00707         x, y = self.getCursorPosition(event)
00708 
00709         views = self.engine.views
00710         found = []
00711 
00712         for view in views:
00713 
00714             if not view.pannable:
00715                 continue
00716 
00717             viewX, viewY, viewWidth, viewHeight = self.getViewBox(view)
00718 
00719             if ((x >= viewX) and
00720                 (x < (viewX + viewWidth)) and
00721                 (y >= viewY) and
00722                 (y < (viewY + viewHeight))):
00723                 found.append(view)
00724 
00725         if found:
00726             self.currentView = found[-1]
00727         else:
00728             self.currentView = None
00729 
00730 
00731     def handleButtonPress(
00732         self,
00733         widget,
00734         event):
00735 
00736         if not self.currentView:
00737             self.panning = False
00738             self.down = False
00739             return
00740 
00741         x, y = self.getCursorPosition(event)
00742         view = self.currentView
00743 
00744         self.down = True
00745         self.panning = True
00746         self.panningView = view
00747         self.panningStartCursorX = x
00748         self.panningStartCursorY = y
00749         self.panningStartPanX = view.panX
00750         self.panningStartPanY = view.panY
00751 
00752 
00753     def handleMouseDrag(
00754         self,
00755         event):
00756 
00757         if not self.panning:
00758             return
00759 
00760         x, y = self.getCursorPosition(event)
00761         view = self.panningView
00762 
00763         dx = self.panningStartCursorX - x
00764         dy = self.panningStartCursorY - y
00765         scale = view.tileSize / self.tileSize
00766         dx *= scale
00767         dy *= scale
00768 
00769         view.panX = self.panningStartPanX + dx
00770         view.panY = self.panningStartPanY + dy
00771         view.updateView()
00772 
00773 
00774     def handleButtonRelease(
00775         self,
00776         widget,
00777         event):
00778 
00779         if not self.panning:
00780             return
00781 
00782         self.handleMouseDrag(
00783             event)
00784 
00785         self.down = False
00786         self.panning = False
00787         self.panningView = None
00788 
00789 
00790     def handleMouseScroll(
00791         self,
00792         widget,
00793         event):
00794 
00795         view = self.currentView
00796         if ((not view) and
00797             (not view.zoomable)):
00798             pass
00799 
00800         direction = event.direction
00801 
00802         if direction == gtk.gdk.SCROLL_UP:
00803             view.changeScale(view.scale * view.scrollWheelZoomScale)
00804         elif direction == gtk.gdk.SCROLL_DOWN:
00805             view.changeScale(view.scale / view.scrollWheelZoomScale)
00806 
00807

00810 
00811 class PreviewMicropolisDrawingArea(MicropolisDrawingArea):
00812 
00813 
00814     def __init__(
00815         self,
00816         **args):
00817 
00818         args['keyable'] = False
00819         args['clickable'] = True
00820         args['zoomable'] = False
00821         args['pannable'] = False
00822         args['menuable'] = False
00823         args['showCursor'] = False
00824         args['showRobots'] = False
00825         args['showSprites'] = False
00826         args['scale'] = 3.0 / micropolisengine.EDITOR_TILE_SIZE
00827         args['overlayAlpha'] = 0.8
00828 
00829         MicropolisDrawingArea.__init__(self, **args)
